attributes.action: Allow PE kits in school during temperatures over 20 degrees
attributes.additional_details: Students suffer a lot during warm days at school and they must wear a blazer a shirt and trousers and this does not allow ventilation in the body.This does not allow children to be comfortable and impacts they daily life at school it also may lead them to be less focused
attributes.background: I would like the government to make all schools allow students to wear their PE kits during weather over 20 degrees

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Update school uniform guidance to prioritise comfort for students in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727890
